main event: In Marysville, Tenn. on 16 Jan 53, a civilian observed a balloon-shaped object with a red light on top and a yellow light on the bottom, flying straight towards the west for 30-40 minutes. It was also observed by military personnel and other civilians in the area with no sound observed.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30-40 minutes, allowing for a detailed and extended viewing of the object.
The object had a red light on top and a yellow light on the bottom, suggesting it was emitting some form of light.
It was observed by military personnel and other civilians, providing multiple witnesses to the event.
No sound was observed coming from the object, adding to the mysterious nature of the sighting.
The observation took place during a period when many upper air research balloons were crossing the area, raising the possibility of misidentification.
sighted object: Balloon-shaped object with red and yellow lights
